"Nazun": "N-Not sure why those enemies showed up, but they've been defeated, so it's time now for our multiple choice quiz!"
"Of the 4 platforms, please head to the one you believe is the correct answer."
"Time now for your first question... Voila!"
"Please head to the platform you think holds the correct answer! Think carefully, now!"
"Finally, here is your last question... Voila!"
"This concludes the multiple choice portion of our quiz. Let's make our way to the next quiz area!"
